erate.description: We are a registered E-Rate Services Provider and we leverage technology funding for schools/libraries and provide guidance on Eligible Services

network.description: Hassle-free, reliable connectivity with speeds up to 400 Mbps. We provide circuit redundancy options and 24x7 network monitoring

mip.description: Custom service and support agreements with remote and onsite helpdesk support. We run quarterly Technology Status Reviews and provide technology planning and budgeting

backups.description: Custom service and support agreements with remote and onsite helpdesk support. We run quarterly Technology Status Reviews and provide technology planning and budgeting
